Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to certain contracts involving industrial painting and industrial coatings
Summary: Requires certain contractor, subcontractor and worker certifications for certain contracts which involve industrial painting or industrial coating work.
LawCode: Add ยง136-d, St Fin L; amd ยง38, Hway L; amd ยง1285-s, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, the highway law and the public authorities law, in relation to certain contracts involving industrial painting and industrial coatings
